sentences.sContent: The place is rife with smugglers, dealers, undocumented immigrants, and slaves.
sentences.sContent_eng: The place is rife with smugglers, dealers, undocumented immigrants, and slaves.
sentences.sCn: 这里到处都是走私者、交易商、无证移民甚至奴隶。

sentences.sContent: “The plan would bring undocumented workers already in this country out of the shadows without amnesty and without animosity,” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The plan would bring undocumented workers already in this country out of the shadows without amnesty and without animosity,” he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说："这项方案将使已在美国的无证件非法移民无需通过大赦、也不引起敌对情绪地摆脱阴影。

sentences.sContent: ...Others highlight the strain that undocumented immigrants place on public services...
...That is a much larger question than what should happen with undocumented workers...
